thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Narendra Investments (Delhi) Gets Shareholders' Nod For Increase In Share Capital Of Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Narendra Investments (Delhi) Gets Shareholders' Nod For Increase In Share Capital Of Co
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Narendra Investments (Delhi) Ltd :
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR INCREASE IN SHARE CAPITAL OF CO
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR ISSUE OF SHARES ON PREFERENTIAL BASIS
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS' NOD FOR ACQUISITION OF MAJORITY STAKE IN FUDKOR INDIA PVT LTD AND VEGICO FOODS Source text - bit.ly/2FKtVp5 Further company coverage:
